Title: Requires funding for special education services and programs for preschool children with disabilities to cover full-day joint classroom instruction
Summary: Requires funding for special education services and programs for preschool children with disabilities to cover joint classroom instruction for such children with disabilities and other children for the same number of hours each day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring funding for special education services and programs for preschool children with disabilities to cover full-day joint classroom instruction
